cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Destroy all equipment equipped to this card then Draw a card and if you destroyed 2 cards: Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion.
[TRIGGER] When this Champion is defeated: Add 1 card from Grave to Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Your opponent draws 1 card then look at your opponents hand.
[TRIGGER] The first time this Champion would be defeated: Set its remaining health to 10.
